explanation:
code_hardening: Added null checks for the NetworkResponse and its headers to avoid NPEs, and marked time-related locals and parameters as final where appropriate.
resolve_compilation_errors: Introduced a new method signature that includes configurable refreshMillis and expireMillis parameters, removed all ETag-related variables/usages, and used fully qualified Volley class names to avoid import or ambiguity issues.
exception_handling: none
logic_customization: Replaced hardcoded cache durations with refreshMillis and expireMillis parameters, computed softTtl and ttl from the current time, stopped reading the ETag header and explicitly set entry.etag to null, and continued to ignore cache-control headers while still parsing the Date header.
refactoring: Renamed local variables to reflect configurable lifetimes instead of fixed constants and adjusted structure to match the new behavior.
misc: Minor comment updates to clarify that ETag handling is intentionally ignored; no new custom API calls were introduced.
